downloadDescription: Stand-alone, redistributable and SDK installers for Microsoft MPI.
detailsSection:
Note: This version of MS-MPI is now archived. The latest version of MS-MPI Redistributable Package is available here
Microsoft MPI (MS-MPI) v7.1 is the successor to MS-MPI v7 (v7.0.12437, released on 11/16/2015).

MS-MPI enables you to develop and run MPI applications without having to set up an HPC Pack cluster.

This release includes the installer for the software development kit (SDK) as a separate file.

The installers for MS-MPI may be redistributed with your own applications, facilitating stand-alone installations on workstation computers as well as HPC Pack clusters.
systemRequirementsSection: Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012, Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2008
installInstructionSection:
To install on a workstation computer:
  1. Run MSMpiSetup.exe or msmpisdk.msi..
  2. Follow the steps in the installation wizard.

For redistribution:
  • You must include the entire installation package in your installation media.
  • Your setup program can run the installation package to install MS-MPI, but you may not redistribute any of the individual files separately in your own installer.
  • Please refer to the license agreement for additional information.
